articles.title: Dallas Cowboys cheerleaders say they’re getting a 400% increase in pay - AP News
articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys cheerleaders say they are getting a serious increase in pay. One of the cheerleaders has said during the second season of the Netflix series “America’s Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboy Cheerleaders” that the members are getting a 400% boost in pa…
articles.content:
FRISCO, Texas (AP) The Dallas Cowboys cheerleaders say they are getting a serious increase in pay.
